speech.text: Imagine an American woman sitting next to a Spanish speaking man. She wants to politely get his attention and says: "excuse me".
the spanish speaker is going to say the word, part by part. please repeat each part aloud after him.
how do you say in Spanish: excuse me
Now, here is miss . Listen and repeat
am buɾ ambuɾ ɣe ambuɾɣe sa ambuɾɣesa
be careful with the r sound that is different than in English
How do you say: Excuse me?
Here is how you say: you understand
listen and repeat "you understand" part by part
now, using a question intonation, try to ask: do you understand?
try to ask: do you understand english?
